sen.e: FUJIWARA no Masatada (it is not known when he was born - 961) was a kuge (court noble) and poet who lived in the middle era of the Heian period.

sen.j: 官位には恵まれず、従五位下に留まり、刑部大輔や周防国国司や豊前国守を歴任したことが知られているのみである。
sen.e: He was not awarded with any privileged official court rank, with only Jugoinoge (junior fifth rank, lower grade), and it is only known that he assumed the posts of Gyobu no taifu (senior assistant minister of justice), of kokushi (a provincial governor) of Suo Province, and of Buzen no kuni no kami (the governor of Buzen Province).
